name: RegistrationTechnologyShowAssistant
0:
”Alexa tell Show Helper to set my activation code to Midwest Security Conference”
”Alexa ask show helper when is lunch”
”Alexa ask show helper where is the applied concepts booth”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: show helper
des: Let Alexa work as your staff of help desk Assistants, in unattended kiosks at your Conference or Exhibit. Our Show Helper product will be available via Alexa For Business installation, this skill illustrates the capabilities of our full product which will be available through our Alexa For Business Network. For more info contact us at RegistrationTechnology.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
